abstract: PetroChina, the state oil and gas giant, became the world’s first company to pass $1 trillion in market capitalization when it debuted on the Shanghai Stock Exchange today.
snippet: PetroChina, the state oil and gas giant, became the world’s first company to pass $1 trillion in market capitalization when it debuted on the Shanghai Stock Exchange today.
lead_paragraph: HONG KONG, Nov. 5 — PetroChina, the state oil and gas giant, became the world’s first company to pass $1 trillion in market capitalization when it debuted on the Shanghai Stock Exchange today.

headline.print_headline: PetroChina Shares Triple Value in Record I.P.O.

byline.original: By Donald Greenlees and David Lague

abstract: Soon after PetroChina makes its debut Monday on the Shanghai Stock Exchange, some expect the firm to surpass Exxon Mobil as the world’s largest company by market capitalization.
snippet: Soon after PetroChina makes its debut Monday on the Shanghai Stock Exchange, some expect the firm to surpass Exxon Mobil as the world’s largest company by market capitalization.
lead_paragraph: HONG KONG, Nov. 4 — When the government-owned oil and gas giant PetroChina makes its debut Monday on the Shanghai Stock Exchange, China’s booming stock markets will be on the verge of setting another milestone. Soon after the Shanghai listing, some analysts expect PetroChina to surpass Exxon Mobil as the world’s largest company by market capitalization.

byline.original: By Donald Greenlees and David Lague
